price: Esos son quienes siguen la guía de su Señor y serán los bienaventurados.
arabic: أُوْلَٰٓئِكَ عَلَىٰ هُدٗى مِّن رَّبِّهِمۡۖ وَأُوْلَٰٓئِكَ هُمُ ٱلۡمُفۡلِحُونَ

version.title: Spanish Translation - Isa Garcia
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish by Muhammad Isa Garcia - Printed in 1433 H.

meta.transliteration: ulāika ʿalā hudan min rabbihim wa-ulāika humu al-muf'liḥūna
